name: Away from beauty 色即是空
name_original: Away from beauty 色即是空
description:
Away from beauty is a color feast, a piece of art that struggles with sexualism and colorism.

Colorism of casual grotesque nicotine taste vs Sexual coldness represented by black and white ash.

GAMEPLAY

  • Control black small planes to avoid and kill strange objects with color.

  • Get a certain score into the vortex and enter the next level.


FEATURES

  • Game is art.

  • Rich features of artillery, more powerful weapons.

  • Original 26 pieces of music
